articles.description: Scan results on a hamstring injury to the strong-running midfielder have been worse than expected
articles.content:

articles.title: Jake Paul responds to Tommy Fury after the British boxer called him out - Daily Mail
articles.description: Jake Paul said he was less than impressed by Tommy Fury's six-round victory over Daniel Bocianski and even claimed no one gave a 'f***' about the fight.
articles.content:
Jake Paul said he was less than impressed by Tommy Fury's six-round victory over Daniel Bocianski and even claimed no one gave a 'f***' about the fight.

articles.author: Leigh Curtis
articles.title: Lee Bowyer will pocket huge sack payout as shock Birmingham City claim made - Birmingham Live
articles.description: Birmingham Live brings you the latest Birmingham City news and what has been said about the sum that Bowyer will be owed if the club decides to part company
articles.content:
Lee Bowyer will pocket a huge £750,000 if he is sacked as Birmingham City manager, according to the Sun.
 The Blues boss is under pressure at St Andrew's after just one win in their last eight games… [+1997 chars]
